QuestData.Title: Ursine Soul
QuestData.Description: <The Ursine Soul is stalwart and brave. The shape of the bear will be yours to call upon.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Ursine Soul to Lady Muunn in the Heart of the Forest.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Ursine Soul to Lady Muunn in the Heart of the Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah. The heart of the bear! A fine shape. It is now yours, should you choose to use it.
